prompt:
Describe how you would go about researching a topic that is new to you.
When I encounter a fresh subject, my initial reaction is to gather knowledge through various channels. This may involve reading articles online or in books, consulting experts in the field, attending conferences or workshops related to the theme, conducting interviews with individuals who have experience pertaining to said topic – these are all valuable methods of acquiring information from credible sources. I also find it beneficial to brainstorm questions and ideas related to this new subject; this way, not only do I absorb information but also think critically about its potential significance within my own context.
